value:
$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|The ljósálfar and their friends are
pursuing us, just as Lady Freyja
had predicted...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|Yes. If our mission continues to go
this smoothly, Lady Freyja is sure
to be most pleased with us.$k$pThough I must say, Ljósálfheimr
is more pleasant than I'd expected
it would be...$k$pThere don't seem to be any
foul-minded lechers anywhere.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...Hm. Indeed.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|I may be saddled with drawing out
their secret fantasies, no matter how
wretched, but even as a dökkálfr...$k$p$EFace_Pain|I will NEVER grow accustomed to
the veins of filth that course through
their minds. Truly. They're beasts.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...I can't say any of the dreams I've
brought mortals have ever been quite
like that.$k$pI've known only nightmare...
Pain... And sorrow.$k$pPeony, the Sweet Dream...I am her
opposite—and she is mine.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|...And? Is a ljósálfr and a dökkálfr
being opposite surprising?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Never mind. Let's go. We have
our orders.$k$p

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... *sniff*$k$pThe scent of bad dreams is growing
stronger, so we must be getting
closer. C'mon—this way!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|P-Peony can SMELL bad dreams?
...Seriously? Is that even possible?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well, this being the dream realm,
we have no real choice but to follow
Peony's lead. So let's get going.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_HAPPY_01,0|$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|The dökkálfar are this way, everyone!
C'mon, follow me!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hang on a minute! Isn't that...the
way we just came from? Why would
we go back the way we came?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Oh! I'm sure it'd be strange in your
world, but it's perfectly reasonable
in the land of dreams. Follow me!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Right behind you, Peony!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If we're here much longer, I worry my
common sense may never recover.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I know exactly what you mean...$k$p$Sbs150|
